DOC.brief_summary: This prospective single blind randomize control pilot study design investigate whether biological barrier Intercoat ( Oxiplex/AP gel ) reduce formation intrauterine adhesion follow hysteroscopic treatment retain product conception .
DOC.brief_title: Efficiency Intercoat ( Oxiplex/AP Gel ) Decreasing Intrauterine Adhesions
DOC.detailed_description: Thirty woman randomly divide equally receive Intercoat follow hysteroscopic treatment retain product conception ( study group ) receive gel ( control ) . Safety efficacy preparation evaluate .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 50 year Availability result vaginal ultrasound diagnostic hysteroscopy Signs infection upon admission Ongoing pregnancy
